thread.title: Ground News - Israeli military says it ‘regrets harm’ to civilians after refugee camp strike
thread.title_full: Ground News - Israeli military says it ‘regrets harm’ to civilians after refugee camp strike

author: Sky News Australia
title: Ground News - Israeli military says it ‘regrets harm’ to civilians after refugee camp strike
text:
Summary by Sky News Australia The Israeli military says it “regrets the harm” caused to civilians by an Israel Defense Forces (IDF) strike in the Maghazi refugee camp in the centre of Gaza. The United Nations estimates that 86 people died in the strike. The Israeli Defence Force have released a statement following investigations into the air strike on Christmas Eve. "A preliminary investigation revealed that additional buildings located near the targets were also hit durin… Share menu More

20 minutes ago · Australia Read Full Article rnd.de Israel's army expresses regret after air strike in refugee quarters On Christmas Eve, Israel attacks targets in a refugee district in the Gaza Strip from the air. Dozens of people, including many civilians, women and children, are killed. An investigation into the incident is intended to explain how this could have happened.
